KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Intro_A: Welcome recruit, I’m Max Ammo and I’m here to prepare and guide you through basic training.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Intro_B: It won’t take long for you to become a true soldier.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Jump_A: Firstly let’s start with the very basics: <Text.Orange>Jump</> – <Text.Orange>Double Jump</> and <Text.Orange>Vault</>.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Jump_B: These actions are all performed with the <Text.Orange>Jump</> button. Collect all the <Text.Yellow>gold credits</> in this area to proceed.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Coin_A: Nicely done. Now follow the <Text.Yellow>gold credits</> to the next area.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Meanbot_A: Now, use your weapon or melee attack to take out those <Text.Red>Bots</>.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Meanbot_B: Your ammo is shown in the bottom right of the ‘Heads up Display’.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Health_A: Trust me, they deserved that. If you do come up against a real threat though...
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Health_B: Be sure to keep an eye on your <Text.Green>Health</> and <Text.Cyan>Shield</>.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Health_C: You can see that in the bottom right of your ‘heads up display’.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Climb_A: Next, follow the <Text.Yellow>credits</> and climb over those boxes to the next area.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Hypercore_A: Ah yes, this beauty here is the <Text.Yellow>HYPERCORE</> the brain of our operation. Literally.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Hypercore_B: These will be what you are defending at all costs.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Hypercore_C: You can see their <Text.Green>Health</>, <Text.Cyan>Shield</> and <Text.Yellow>Battery Power</> in the top left of your heads up display.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Buildcredits_B: These <Text.Yellow>credits</> will come handy during the build mode. You can press the build button to bring out your build tool.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Buildcredits_D: Go ahead and build some simple defences around the core with the <Text.Yellow>build credits</> you picked up earlier.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Buildcredits_E: <Text.Orange>Traps</> don’t use any power but they can be offensive towards enemies.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Buildcredits_F: <Text.Orange>Walls</> can be useful for holding off the enemies advances, but not for long.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Buildcredits_G: You can also destroy <Text.Orange>Buildables</> for a partial refund of their costs.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Buildcredits_H: After the build mode is complete and you’ve spent all your <Text.Yellow>Credits</> you have to prepare for the oncoming <Text.Orange>Waves</>.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_SmallWave_B: You can see your current <Text.Orange>Wave</> and the <Text.Yellow>Progression</> in the top left of your ‘Heads Up Display’.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Powernode_A: Enemies defeated, that wasn’t so hard after all.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Powernode_B: Now, grab that <Text.Cyan>Battery</> and place it into the <Text.Orange>Power Node</>.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Powernode_C: This will allow the shield of the <Text.Yellow>HYPERCORE</> to recharge when damaged and will also power turrets that are protecting this <Text.Yellow>HYPERCORE</>.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Building_A: Fetch some more <Text.Yellow>Build Credits</> and build yourself a <Text.Orange>turret</>.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Building_B: Arm yourself with the <Text.Orange>Machine Gun</> and <Text.Orange>Stock Attachment</> next to the <Text.Yellow>HYPERCORE</>.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Building_C: Attachments can improve abilities on your weapons such as lowered recoil or improved accuracy.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Buildcredits_A: Now, lets learn how to best defend. You should grab those <Text.Yellow>Build Credits</> by the <Text.Yellow>HYPERCORE</>.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Buildcredits_C: Your <Text.Yellow>Credit</> count can be seen in the bottom right of the HUD.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_LargeWave_A: Okay, now you’re ready for a bigger challenge. Defend the <Text.Yellow>HYPERCORE</>!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Jumppad_A: Remember, not all battles are won by fighting.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Jumppad_B: Traversing through the environment to find weapons, credits and collectibles is paramount to your success.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Jumppad_C: Don’t be afraid to climb, jump and explore – you never know what <Text.Purple>secrets</> you will find.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Jumppad_D: As a matter of fact, you should build that <Text.Orange>Jump Pad</> to see where it leads.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Collectable_A: Ah, a <Text.Purple>secret collectible</>. Collecting all these on a level will give you extra unlocks upon completing a level. Other unlocks are given depending on how many <Text.Yellow>HYPERCORE</>s you are able to protect.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Finale_A: I can’t teach you everything about the world of <Text.Yellow>HYPERCHARGE</> as there is much more to explore and find.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Finale_B: Good luck on the battlefield, soldier!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Teammate_A: Because you are working as a team you should share unused build <Text.Yellow>Credits</> with your team mates.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Teammate_B: Give a few <Text.Yellow>Credits</> to your team mate.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Praise_A: Nice job – I see a lot of potential in you recruit.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Praise_B: The award you will receive for completing a level will be based on how many <Text.Yellow>HYPERCORE</>s you are able to keep alive and how much damage they receive.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Generic Phrases_NotSupposed_01: You are not supposed to be here.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Generic Phrases_DontGiveUp_01: Don’t give up, there is still time to succeed!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Generic Phrases_BadLuck_01: Bad luck recruit, now get defending that <Text.Yellow>HYPERCORE</>!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Tutorial_Defeat_C: I’m sure you’ll get them next time.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_CoreDestructionImminent_01: A <Text.Yellow>HYPERCORE</> is about to be destroyed!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_CoreDestructionImminent_05: Soldier! Protect the <Text.Yellow>HYPERCORE</> before it’s too late!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_CoreAttacked_04: What's going on?! The <Text.Yellow>HYPERCORE</> is taking damage!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_CoreAttacked_05: What are you doing?! The <Text.Yellow>HYPERCORE</> is taking damage!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_BuildDefenses_01: Do you have a death wish Soldier? How are you going to survive without building <Text.Orange>Defences</>?
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_BuildDefenses_02: Build some <Text.Orange>Fortifications</>! You need some line of defence!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_BuildDefenses_03: Ohhh, so you think you can win without building your <Text.Orange>Defences</>? The loss is on you Soldier!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_BuildDefenses_04: Don’t forget to build <Text.Orange>Walls</>, <Text.Orange>Traps</> and construct <Text.Orange>Turrets</>!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_BuildDefenses_05: You won’t survive without building some <Text.Orange>Defences</>!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_BuildDefenses_06: Use the tools at your disposal! Get some <Text.Orange>Defences</> up, on the double!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_BuildDefenses_07: You can’t always win with weapons alone. Build some <Text.Orange>defences</>!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_BuildDefenses_08: You should build some defences around the <Text.Yellow>HYPERCORE</>s.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_DepletedPowernode_02: <Text.Orange>Power Node</> needs a <Text.Cyan>Battery</>. Find one A-SAP!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_DepletedPowernode_04: <Text.Orange>Power Node</> has no energy. Look for a <Text.Cyan>Battery!</>
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_DepletedPowernode_05: <Text.Orange>Power Node</> is outta’ juice! Power it up, pronto!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_PowernodeLow_03: Keep an eye on your <Text.Cyan>Power</>! <Text.Orange>Power Node</> is running on empty!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_PowernodeLow_04: Make sure your <Text.Orange>Power Node</> keeps going, it’s running low!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_PowernodeLow_05: Don’t forget to keep your <Text.Yellow>HYPERCORE</> powered! <Text.Orange>Power Node</> is nearly out!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_BuildmodeEndsWave_01: This may look like a safe place, but you don’t always know what dangers are lurking. Be careful, Soldier.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_BuildmodeEndsWave_02: The quiet before the storm, soldier. Keep your head on tight.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_BuildmodeEndsWave_03: Let’s hope your lines hold, the enemies are on their way.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_BuildmodeEndsWave_04: It doesn’t look like a battlefield now, but that'll change right quick. Get ready.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_BuildmodeEndsWave_05: Remember to work as a team. Good luck squad.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_BuildmodeEndsWave_06: Prepare for battle. The enemy draws closer.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_BuildmodeEndsWave_07: This is it. It’s time to save the <Text.Yellow>HYPERCORE</>s!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_BuildmodeEndsWave_08: I trust you’ll keep those <Text.Yellow>HYPERCORE</>s alive, you got this!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_BuildmodeEndsWave_09: Good luck, we’re counting on your keeping those <Text.Yellow>HYPERCORE</>s alive.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_BuildmodeEndsWave_10: Get your defences built A-SAP, the enemy are on their way!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_BuildmodeEndsWave_11: Keep your wits about you, the enemy can come from anywhere!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_BuildmodeEndsWave_12: Don’t forget to search the area, any <Text.Yellow>Resources</> you find will help you defend the <Text.Yellow>HYPERCORE</>s.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_BuildmodeEndsWave_13: Time to put that training to use, don’t let the enemy destroy your <Text.Yellow>HYPERCORE</>s.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_PlayerJoins_01: Fresh meat! Oh. I mean... Plastic!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_PlayerJoins_02: A new player... I’ve got my eye on you Soldier!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_PlayerJoins_03: Great! A new addition to the squad.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_PlayerJoins_05: Reinforcements en-route soldier, hold the line!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_EnemyDestroyedBuildables_01: The enemy is too close! Rebuild your <Text.Orange>Defences</>!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_EnemyDestroyedBuildables_02: The enemy is destroying your <Text.Orange>Defences</>. Do not forget to rebuild them!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_EnemyDestroyedBuildables_03: Your <Text.Orange>Defences</> are being destroyed! Be vigilant!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_EnemyDestroyedBuildables_04: Fortify your lines, soldier! The enemy are overpowering 'em!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_EnemyDestroyedBuildables_05: Watch out, the enemy are destroying your <Text.Orange>Defences</>!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_EnemyDestroyedBuildables_06: Enemy has taken out some of your <Text.Orange>Defences</>, keep an eye on the <Text.Yellow>HYPERCORE</>.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_EnemyDestroyedBuildables_07: The enemy are pushing closer, <Text.Orange>Defences</> are failing, watch out!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_EnemyDestroyedBuildables_09: Your defences are falling, I hope you have enough credits to rebuild!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Hallway_01: Alright Soldier, no dawdling! You’ll need to search the area for <Text.Orange>Weapons</>, <Text.Yellow>Credits</> and <Text.Cyan>Batteries</>.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Hallway_02: <Text.Yellow>Credits</> are your currency and allow you to build <Text.Orange>Defences</>. <Text.Cyan>Batteries</> power your defences and help aid you in battle. Good luck.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Hallway_03: Hit the ground running, soldier. Scour the battlefield for <Text.Orange>Weapons</> and <Text.Yellow>Credits</>. Don’t forget to build <Text.Orange>Defences</> and to keep 'em <Text.Cyan>Powered</>.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Bathroom_01: It doesn’t matter who blocked the toilet, just protect the <Text.Yellow>HYPERCORE</>s!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Bathroom_02: The enemy have manoeuvred their way through the pipes and made it into the bathroom. Eliminate them!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_KidsBedroom_01: Command told me Andy won’t be home for another hour. We must destroy the enemy before he returns!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_KidsBedroom_02: Stand up your <Text.Orange>Defences</>, the enemy won’t know what hit 'em!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_KidsBedroom_03: There are no <Text.Cyan>Batteries</> in your <Text.Orange>Power Nodes</>. Look around and find some.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_ToyPalace_01: The enemy are producing their line of weaponised toys here. It’s your job to put a stop to it!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_ToyPalace_02: So, the enemy are trying to take control of the entire store? They’ll have to get through you first!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_ToyPalace_03: The enemy are trying to secure reinforcements, soldiers. Put a stop to them!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_ToyPalace_04: To build <Text.Orange>Defences</>, you’ll need to search for <Text.Yellow>Credits</>.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_ToyPalace_05: Find <Text.Cyan>Batteries</> and charge up your <Text.Orange>Power Nodes</>.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_ToyPalace_06: Some of you were purchased here – some of you will die here!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_ToyPalace_07: We're in the heart of enemy territory here, soldiers. Put a stop to their advances!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Arcade_01: No playing on the arcade machines, you have a job to do!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Arcade_02: I miss the 80’s... oh I feel so old, my ball-joints are creakin'!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Arcade_03: Let’s keep this battle contained to the table.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Attic_01: Who knows what evil toys are hiding in here!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Attic_02: Spiders... I hope there’s no Spiders!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Attic_03: I have a bad feeling about this place....
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Attic_04: Be careful soldiers, the enemy might have a few surprises for us around here!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Garage_01: If our enemy learns how to drive... we’re doomed!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Garage_02: Does... anyone have a driving licence?
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Garage_03: Soldier! Quit your whining and prepare for battle!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Garden_01: First things first. The <Text.Red>Dinosaur</>... it's not friendly.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Garden_02: Watch out for the <Text.Red>Army Men</>, they blend in with the grass!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Garden_03: This is <Text.Red>Dino</> territory. What could go wrong?
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Garden_04: That <Text.Red>T-Rex</> doesn’t want to be fed, he wants to hunt!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_HallwayHard_01: It might look like a Hallway... because it is just... a hallway.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_HallwayHard_02: The task ahead is not going to be easy, I want to see your best effort!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_HallwayHard_03: Where’s the torches when you need ’em?
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Lavalevel_01: Lava and Plastic do not mix well.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Lavalevel_02: If you fall into the lava... there’s no repairing you Soldier.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Apartment_01: What a messy apartment. When we win the battle, clean up this place!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Apartment_02: Do not think about eating the rest of that Pizza. It is mine!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Apartment_03: Leftovers? Don't mind if I do.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Kitchen_01: The enemy have made this kitchen a mess. Let’s mop them up!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Kitchen_02: If you lose this battle I’ll make you eat the Broccoli, Soldier!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Kitchen_03: Time to fry up some justice, soldier!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Shed_01: It’s claustrophobic in here – try not to let it get to you.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Shed_02: Bit dark and dingy in here - watch out for the spiders, soldier.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_Shed_03: Not a lot of space to maneuver. This one could be tough.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_ToystoreNightshift_01: Let’s hope the moonlight provides enough visibility.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_MapIntro_ToystoreNightshift_02: Arm yourself with flashlights soldiers – it’s dark in here.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnMeanbot_01: <Text.Red>Meanbots</>... Argh, a headshot won’t do. They’ll just keep coming. Shoot them down until they stop moving!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnMeanbot_02: <Text.Red>Meanbots</>... they'll just keep coming even without their noggin'. Fill 'em full of BBs until they stop moving!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnMeanbot_03: Robotic weaponry. Hah! They're no match for you!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnSpinner_01: <Text.Red>Spinners</> are on their way! They’re quick, deadly and bounce all over the place. Don’t let them overwhelm you.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnSpinner_02: Soldier, a little bit of advice: remember to <Text.Orange>Jump</>.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnSpinner_03: Watch out for those <Text.Red>Spinners</>, they'll come at you fast! Some <Text.Orange>Glue</> would slow them down.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnJet_01: Cowards! They're sending in <Text.Red>Fighter Jets</>! Watch out for their missiles!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnJet_02: <Text.Red>Fighter Jets</>? When I was a lad we settled conflicts hand to hand!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnJet_03: Incoming <Text.Red>Fighter Jets</>, let’s hope you have some <Text.Orange>Anti-Air</> defences!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnJet_04: The enemy have called in air support! Bring 'em down!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnChungus_01: The vile <Text.Red>Chungus</>. Slimy and disgusting. Don’t get close, they explode when they’ve taken enough punishment.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnChungus_02: Disgusting creatures! Keep their slime away from the core!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnArmyMen_01: <Text.Red>Army Men</> will not hesitate to shoot you. Watch your <Text.Green>Health</> Solider!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnArmyMen_02: So, they’ve deployed <Text.Red>Greens</> to do their dirty work?
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnArmyMenTank_01: <Text.Red>Tanks</>! I hope for your sake you've built <Text.Orange>Tank Traps</>!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnCargoPlane_01: Get to cover! We have a <Text.Red>Cargo Plane</> on the way and its packed full of <Text.Red>Paratroopers</>!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnCargoPlane_02: Looks like they’re dropping in reinforcements. Stay alert!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnZombie_01: Who created these monstrosities... clearly a failed experiment.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnZombie_02: What kind of monster would create something like this?
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnZombie_03: Ah, the undead want a piece of the action? Show 'em how it's done!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnZombie_04: Watch out for those abominations. Destroying their limbs will slow 'em down.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnUfo_01: That’s strange... My radar is jammed. Look out, something advanced is heading our way!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnUfo_02: <Text.Red>Aliens</>! And I don’t think they come in peace!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnBouncyBall_01: Annoying little pests! A huge swathe of <Text.Red>Bouncy Balls</> doing what they do best: bounce all over the place!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnBouncyBall_03: Don’t underestimate those colourful balls – they'll take you down in no time.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnChopper_01: Multiple <Text.Red>Choppers</> inbound. Don’t worry Soldier, your <Text.Orange>Air Defences</> will obliterate them. You have built air defences, right?
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnChopper_02: Enemy <Text.Red>Helicopters</> are trying to control the skies, I hope for your sake you have <Text.Orange>Anti-Air</> defences!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnTrex_01: Keep your composure Soldier! It’s only a little <Text.Red>T-Rex</>!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnTrex_02: Finally, a real threat! The <Text.Red>T-Rex</> has a weak spot, find it!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnDemolisher_01: Do you want to be disintegrated? Do not let the <Text.Red>Demolishers</> laser beam hit you!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnDemolisher_02: Ohhh boy, that’s a big toy!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnDemolisher_03: That guy looks tough. You’re gonna need a big gun for this one.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnDemolisher_04: It has heavy duty armor! It must have a weak point!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnDemolisher_05: The <Text.Red>Demolisher</> has some heavy duty armor! It must have a weak point somewhere!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnSoldier_01: The enemy are deploying their elite operatives! Don't get cocky now, soldiers!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnSoldier_02: Enemy <Text.Red>Soldiers</> on the field! Highly trained, but we trained you better, squad!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnPony_01: The enemy have sent their cavalry: flying <Text.Red>Ponies</>!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_SpawnPony_02: Don’t be fooled by their cuteness, they are evil creatures!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Generic Phrases_BatteryEmpty_01: Your <Text.Cyan>Battery</> has ran out, find another one to keep your <Text.Yellow>HYPERCORE</> and <Text.Orange>Turrets</> powered.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Generic Phrases_BatteryNPC_01: Watch out for enemies that may target your <Text.Orange>Power Node</>.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Generic Phrases_UseWeapon_01: Use your weapon to destroy those targets.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Generic Phrases_AimKey_01: You can hold the Aim button to help improve your accuracy when shooting.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Victory_01: Soldier, I’m very proud. It’s an honour to have you defending the <Text.Yellow>HYPERCORE</>!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Victory_02: You’ve just saved all of toy-kind.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Victory_03: Squad, you’re in for a good meal tonight. Well done!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Defeat_02: The battle is not over until I say so! Get back in there and win this round!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Defeat_03: Suck it up soldier and try again!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Defeat_04: I know you can do better. So dig in and try harder!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Defeat_05: Quit your bellyaching and try again soldier!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Boss_Demolisher_01: For your size, you’re one tough toy!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Killed_Jet_03: Who needs an anti-air turret when we have you?!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Boss_CargoPlane_01: You’re a great asset to the war effort soldier!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Boss_CargoPlane_02: I guess you don’t like flying, huh?
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_Killed_Tank_01: From now on, I’m gonna call you the tank busta!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_PickupBattery_01: This is a <Text.Cyan>Battery</>. Place it in your <Text.Orange>Power Node</> to charge it. It’s that simple.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_PickupBattery_02: Good job. You’ve found a <Text.Cyan>Battery</>. Place it inside your <Text.Orange>Power Node</>, located near the <Text.Yellow>HYPERCORE</>.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_PickupBattery_03: <Text.Cyan>Batteries</> power your defences. Put them inside your <Text.Orange>Power Nodes</>.
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_PickupBuildcredits_01: Great work soldier! You’ve found <Text.Yellow>Build Credits</>. You can now build <Text.Orange>Defences</>!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_PickupBuildcredits_02: Lovely jubbly. Go ahead and spend your <Text.Yellow>Build Credits</>. Preferably on your <Text.Orange>Defences</>!
KeysToMetaData.FE_MA_PickupBuildcredits_03: <Text.Yellow>Build Credits</> are not to be wasted! Use them to construct your <Text.Orange>Defences</>.
KeysToMetaData.TutorialObjectiveAimShoot: <Text.Orange>Aim</> your weapon and shoot those targets!
KeysToMetaData.TutorialObjectiveNextArea: Follow the <Text.Yellow>Credits</> to the next area
